summary:
Account Health: Good (77/100)

Analysed 9 campaigns with total spend of £2,324 and blended ROAS of 1.44x.

Detected 3 issues requiring attention.

campaign_analyses.campaign_name: T2MD | Search | Trees Port 150 16/6 Ai 4/8 Lemon paused 20/8 131 3/9
T2MD | Search | Memorial Gift 150 20/5 140 7/4 Port 150  16/6 AI Max 28/7 144

recommendations.title: Critical: T2MD | P Max Shopping | Unprofitable 150 160 3/9 150 5/9 140 23/10 - POAS 1.17x below Tier C threshold (1.35x) with significant spend
recommendations.problem: POAS 1.17x below Tier C threshold (1.35x) with significant spend
recommendations.recommendation:
ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS:

1. Insufficient budget for Performance Max learning
2. Potential feed quality issues affecting product eligibility
3. December CPC inflation (peak season competition)


EVIDENCE:
• PMax requires £20+/day for effective learning (currently spending less)
• Known issue from CONTEXT.md: "Feed issues can reset learning on bestsellers"
• Known issue from CONTEXT.md: "CPC inflation outpacing efficiency gains"


RECOMMENDED FIXES:

1. Increase daily budget to £20-30/day minimum
   Expected Impact: Enable proper machine learning, improve asset testing

2. Check Merchant Centre for disapprovals, verify Product Hero labels in Channable, ensure Heroes have complete data
   Expected Impact: Improve product approval rate, maximize impression share for profitable products

3. Accept higher CPCs during peak season IF profit targets maintained, focus budget on Heroes, review profit margins
   Expected Impact: Maximize profitable volume during peak season without sacrificing profitability

recommendations.title: Critical: T2MD | Search | Roses 152 29/8 140 14/1 155 16/6 Port 150 16/6 AI Max 1/7 160 3/7 150 23/10 - POAS 0.93x below Tier C threshold (1.35x) with significant spend

recommendations.title: Product Hero: Verify Zombies are excluded from underperforming Shopping/PMax campaigns
recommendations.problem: 1 Shopping/PMax campaigns below Tier C - likely spending on unprofitable products
recommendations.recommendation:
Action: Verify Zombies are excluded from underperforming Shopping/PMax campaigns

How: Channable → Filter Zombies → Ensure excluded via Shopping campaign negative product groups or PMax audience signals

Expected Outcome: Stop budget waste on zero-conversion products, reallocate to Heroes

recommendations.title: Product Hero: Export Product Hero labels from Channable and calculate POAS by label
recommendations.problem: Understand which product types (Heroes/Sidekicks/Villains/Zombies) are driving profit
recommendations.recommendation:
Action: Export Product Hero labels from Channable and calculate POAS by label

How: Channable → Export product data with custom labels → Group by label in Google Sheets → Calculate profit by label

Expected Outcome: Identify if budget is being wasted on Villains/Zombies vs Heroes

recommendations.title: Best Practice: Performance Max Budget
recommendations.problem: Industry best practice: PMax campaigns require minimum £20/day for effective learning, ideally £30-50/day during peak seasons
recommendations.recommendation:
Application: Review PMax campaigns with <£20/day budget

Source: Google Ads best practices (knowledge base)

recommendations.title: Best Practice: Product Feed Quality
recommendations.problem: Industry best practice: Product titles should include: Brand + Product Type + Key Attributes. Poor titles reduce impression share by 30-50%
recommendations.recommendation:
Application: Audit Merchant Centre feed titles via Channable

Source: Shopping feed optimization guidelines

recommendations.title: Best Practice: Seasonal Campaign Management
recommendations.problem: Industry best practice: December: Increase budgets on Tier A campaigns by 30-50%, focus on gift-focused messaging, monitor stock levels daily
recommendations.recommendation:
Application: Current month (December) - implement immediately

Source: E-commerce seasonal strategies

seasonal_issues.issue: Verify Christmas/gift-focused ad copy is active across all campaigns
seasonal_issues.fix: Review RSAs and PMax assets for "gift", "Christmas", "memorial tree" messaging
seasonal_issues.impact: Seasonal messaging improves CTR and conversion rates during December

seasonality_context.guidance:
Christmas Peak Season - Highest demand period:
• Increase Tier A budgets by 30-50%
• Focus on Heroes (gift trees, memorial trees)
• Monitor stock levels daily (OOS = missed opportunity)
• Ensure gift-focused messaging active
• Accept higher CPCs if profit targets maintained
